citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A written itinerary had not been submitted by the licensee prior to exhibition with overnight travel. The licensee was in a
travel status at the time of inspection, and an itinerary was available for review at the time of inspection at the home site,
however the overnight travel with exhibition was currently taking place. Failure to provide itinerary information results in
the inability to conduct an inspection to ensure the welfare of the animals covered under the Animal Welfare Act. A written
itinerary shall be submitted no fewer than 2 days in advance of any travel, and shall contain complete and accurate
information concerning the whereabouts of any animal intended for exhibition at a location other than the approved site.
****Correct for future exhibition with overnight travel after 9/1/23
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.126(c) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A written itinerary had not been submitted by the licensee prior to exhibition with overnight travel. The licensee was in a 
travel status at the time of inspection, and an itinerary was available for review at the time of inspection at the home site, 
however the overnight travel with exhibition was currently taking place. Failure to provide itinerary information results in 
the inability to conduct an inspection to ensure the welfare of the animals covered under the Animal Welfare Act. A written 
itinerary shall be submitted no fewer than 2 days in advance of any travel, and shall contain complete and accurate 
information concerning the whereabouts of any animal intended for exhibition at a location other than the approved site.  
 
****Correct for future exhibition with overnight travel after 9/1/23 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
